wikipedia_page.main: Dame Josephine Williams,  (born 8 July 1948) is a British administrator and social worker who was the chief executive of Mencap until 1 November 2008. She was chairman of the Care Quality Commission between 2010 and 2012.

response: * Chair: David Prior, 2013–2015; Jo Williams, 2010–2012; Barbara Young, Baroness Young of Old Scone, 2008–2009.https://uk.linkedin.com/in/barbara-young-5377b020
